db:abstract.db:para: Provides an API to make serial programming simple and portable.
This documentation was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:article.db:para: Qt Serial Port provides the basic functionality, which includes configuring, I/O operations, getting and setting the control signals of the RS-232 pinouts.
The following items are not supported by this module:

db:listitem.db:para: Terminal features, such as echo, control CR/LF, and so on.
Configuring timeouts and delays while reading or writing.
